details:
adjective
- ludicrously odd
= synonyms: grotesque
- extraordinarily good or great
= synonyms: wondrous
- extravagantly fanciful in design, construction, appearance
= example: extravagantly fanciful in design, construction, appearance
- existing in fancy only
= example: existing in fancy only
= synonyms: fantastical
- fanciful and unrealistic
= synonyms: wild
